content_descriptors.notes:
It is a realistic hunting game. 
Animals are shot and killed with rifles, blood splatters are displayed on the ground. 
Animal anatomy and the hit by the bullet are shown in the shot review. Animals are displayed as taxidermized trophies in the hunting lodge.
